All of the symptoms you mentioned can be symptoms of diabetes, as well.  You should check for that, too.However, weight loss after pregnancy is what is supposed to happen.  24 pounds is just about the right amount to lose, too.  Remember, you were carrying a lot of extra stuff in your body while pregnant.  The rest of the symptoms could definitely be attributed to hormones.  Plus, if you're breastfeeding, you will get very thirsty.  It's nature's way of reminding you to drink to keep your milk supply up.
